attributes.action: These Island deserves to become A nation of peoples united as one Nation with justice opportunity and prosperity for all.
attributes.additional_details:
Can we have a referendum to find if the majority of people on these Islands want to live in One Nation where all peoples are equal and united. Having multiple tiers of government does not help, only makes things worse.

It's time for the silent majority to be recognised, who would like the United Kingdom to become a fully unified nation whose people all are united and working together for the benefit for all it's citizens.
